thread.title_full: â€œNevertheless, She Persistedâ€ Is Coming to a T-Shirt Near You

author: Alicia Adamczyk
title: â€œNevertheless, She Persistedâ€ Is Coming to a T-Shirt Near You
text:
Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell gave Democrats an unexpected rallying cry yesterdayâ€”and a golden fundraising opportunity.
During Jeff Sessionsâ€™ confirmation hearing for Attorney General, McConnell silenced Senator Elizabeth Warren after she read part of a letter written by civil rights leader Coretta Scott King, on the grounds that she had violated a seldom-invoked Senate rule called â€œRule 19.â€ The rule prohibits senators from impugning one another. She is not allowed to speak for the rest of the debate over Sessionsâ€™ nomination.
â€œShe was warned. She was given an explanation. Nevertheless, she persisted,â€ McConnell said. With that line, the internet lit up. #LetLizSpeak began trending, and people tweeted the quote coupled with photos of feminist icons ranging from Rosa Parks to Ruth Bader Ginsburg to Malala Yousafzai.

For disillusioned Democrats, â€œNevertheless, she persistedâ€ immediately became the new â€œ Nasty Woman .â€ And just as President Donald Trumpâ€™s nasty moniker for Hillary Clinton proliferated on t-shirts, pins, and other items ahead of the election, you can already find McConnellâ€™s words emblazoned on posters, stickers , and fitted tees . Not to mention mugs , iPad cases , and even more t-shirts . ( So many t-shirts .) Though these retailers seem to be capitalizing on a hot trend, the Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee has used it as a call to raise funds for progressive causes.
The rallying cry could prove especially lucrative for Warren, whose new book â€œThis Fight is Our Fight: The Battle to Save Americaâ€™s Middle Classâ€ will be published in April .
Turns out a man silencing a powerful woman from reading another powerful womanâ€™s words on the Senate floor is a great way to get thousands of others to speak up.
I'll hang this one up right next to my #nastywoman tee #neverthelessshepersisted #LetLizSpeak @SenWarren #warrior #resist #movement ğŸ’ªğŸ¼ğŸ’ªğŸ¼ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ pic.twitter.com/QnepjGKJyv

Feminist slogan for the present day. Now live on @redmolotov ! #neverthelessshepersisted #shepersists https://t.co/0atEOV0tAk pic.twitter.com/vDk59fLDYl 
â€” Elou Carroll (@KeyChild) February 8, 2017 
"She was warned. Nevertheless she persisted." Pretty much the history of womankind, courtesy of Senator Mitch McConnell, who told Senator Elizabeth Warren (and Corretta Scott King) to sit down and shut up tonight. Senator McConnell is about to find out what persistence really means. #EnjoyTheShitstorm #NeverthelessShePersisted #LetLizSpeak #ElizabethWarren #Resist
